title: Handbook of Chemical and Biological Warfare Agents-Ellison(1999)
description:
Author: D. Hank Ellison
Language: eng
ISBN13: 9780849328039
ISBN10: 0849328039
Format: pdf 
Pages: 504

 
   The 504-page book is formatted into a series of indices developed to facilitate rapid access to key information on chemical, biological and toxin agents, with each index cross-referenced to all others. The wealth of data not only include the physical appearance, odor, signs and symptoms of dangerous materials such as nerve agents and vesicants, but the detection and removal of such agents and the treatment of victims.

   About the Author: D. Hank Ellison, a former U.S. Environmental Protection Agency emergency responder and officer in the Chemical Corps who provides chemical and biological counterterrorism training to HazMat, Police SWAT and Explosive Ordinance Disposal teams, also includes a litany of guidelines from such sources as the US Army,and other agencies
